text:
*Important announcement for serverless functions.*
Specifically important if you already have CMS Hub Serverless functions using node 12 or Developer Projects based functions using node 12. We are deprecating support for Node 12.  On March 24th you will be required to update to a newer version of node to update existing functions. _*Existing functions running node 12 will continue to run beyond March 24th.*_
• CMS Hub supports up to Node v18 now
• Developer Projects supports up to Node v16.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/deprecation-of-node-v12-in-all-serverless-functions|There are more details in the announcement> and I recommend reading it if you have serverless functions.
